title: bitfex.trade
author: bitfex.trade
content: BitFex.trade crypto exchange provides a convenient service for transferring tokens to a new blockchain or reissuing tokens in current blockchain in case of hacking. Itâ€™s free for token holder.What opportunities do we offer:1. Transfer of a token to a new blockchain (your traders return tokens to you in the current blockchain, and they receive the same amount of tokens in the new blockchain).2. A copy of the token in the new blockchain (your holders make a deposit of your tokens and for the amount of the deposit we charge them the same amount of your tokens in the new blockchain)3. Reissue of tokens in the same blockchain (your holders return tokens to you, and in return receive new tokens in the same amount)Why do you need this:- Your tokens have been stolen and you need to get balances from scammers holders of your token, in this case we can change the balances to everyone except certain holders.- You may need to change the blockchain if you want to start trade, for example, on Binance in the BEP20 blockchain, and your token in the Ethereum blockchain (ERC20).- Your holders are not satisfied with the network fee or transaction processing speed and you want to switch to another, more suitable blockchain.Why is it convenient:- Simple. Holders don't need to be forced to withdraw funds to cold wallets from the exchange where your token is currently traded. They will only need to make a simple and familiar procedure for withdrawing tokens to a deposit wallet on our crypto exchange.- Quickly. After the deposit, the funds will be exchanged inside the exchange automatically, without the participation of the holder.- Safe. Holders will not be afraid for the safety of their coins, which they will send for exchange, since the exchange will be handled by an exchange with an excellent long-term reputation.- Profitable. Withdrawal of exchanged tokens without fee.
